item.title: Deep Dive 2019 - Writing a Ray Tracer in Go
item.description: This year, I decided to start doing an annual deep dive on a subject that I know nothing about. My decision was inspired by a quote that I saw on twitter. At any time of your life, you should be learning something new that makes you feel like an idiot. — Orange Book (@orangebook_) October 18, 2019 I’m grateful that I happened to see this tweet because it inspired me to take action and learn something new.
